text: Hans Bangerter (10 June 1924 â€“ August 2022) was a Swiss football administrator. He was the General Secretary of the UEFA from 1960 to 1989. He was chairman of the board of the Euro-Sportring Foundation. He was born in Studen, Switzerland. Bangerter died in August 2022 at the age of 98. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:UEFA Category:Swiss football managers Category:People from the canton of Bern
title: Hans Bangerter
